current_phase: Phase 6 Complete: Trait Definitions and Plugin Entry Points
recent_accomplishments: Implemented trait declaration parsing and code generation
Added annotation system (@skill, @command) to AST and parser
Added array and object destructuring support
Updated runtime imports to include delegate function

trait_support.description: Traits compile to exported JavaScript functions
trait_support.session_parameter: Trait methods automatically receive session as first parameter

annotations.ast: Annotation struct with name and optional arg fields

destructuring.array: var [_, x, _] = expr works with ignore patterns
destructuring.object: var {x, y} = expr with shorthand and renaming

files_modified: crates/patchwork-parser/src/ast.rs - Added Annotation struct, annotations field to FunctionDecl
crates/patchwork-compiler/src/codegen.rs - Added trait codegen, delegate handling, destructuring
examples/historian/historian.pw - Updated annotations to use @ syntax

next_steps.phase_7: Import/Export System - enable multi-file compilation for historian's 4 files
